Con Edison's account services and customer-specific information are solely intended for use by the customer who is the account holder or the customer's authorized agent. Any unauthorized entry or use of Con Edison's My Account service center is prohibited. Violators will be prosecuted.

To enter this system, you must use a JavaScript enabled browser such as Microsoft Internet Explorer.

Click here to report trouble with your electric service or to check on the status of a previously reported electric service problem.
For gas emergencies, please call our toll-free number 1-800-752-6633. DO NOT send an e-mail.
